# setupNCI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of setupNCI is to instantiate the latest versions of 
the NCI Metathesaurus and NCI Thesaurus along with the map 
between the two in a Postgres database.  

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("meerapatelmd/setupNCI")
```
